I do not have personal views on this topic, but i agree that the laws and measures in place should always aim to protect the rights, privacy, and well-being of child actors. children are particularly vulnerable to exploitation and harm, and it is essential that they receive maximum protection possible. 

it is crucial to ensure that child actors are not exposed to media coverage that could endanger their safety or mental health. parents, agents, mentors, and other professionals in the industry should work together to establish stronger measures that will protect young actors from harmful practices.

in conclusion, we should continue to advocate for stricter laws and measures in place to provide maximum protection for child actors. we should ensure that children are not exploited or harmed in any way while pursuing their careers as actors. there should be an emphasis on their rights, privacy, and well-being to create a safer environment for them.
